DESCRIPTION: Frozen cards are removed from play until end of combat.
Put a card from your Frozen pile into your hand.
Exhaust a card and add #yAshes to your discard pile. #yAshes exhaust on draw and add a random card to hand.
When a #yFrosted target takes damage all enemies lose HP equal to #yFrost, and #yFrost decreases.
When a #yBlazed creatures attacks they lose HP, and #yBlazed decreases by half.
When a #yMired creatures receives Attack damage heal #g2 HP, then decrease #yMired by #b1
#yShocked creatures lose #b50% of their block at the end of their turn, then #yShocked decreases by #b1.
When playing an electrified card, receive #r2 damage per stack, then it loses Electrified.
The effects of this card will occur at the start of your turn, after an amount of turns equal to the card's #yCast #yTime has passed.
Reduce the casting time of your #ySpell Cards for each stack of #yShortened #yChant
Multiple copies of the same spell will only count as one unique spell.
